titleStmt.title: Orders for the redresse of abuse in diet, by her Maiesties expresse pleasure, and absolute commandement to be obserued in the time of this scarsitie and dearth, both by the ministers, and others of the laitie of the realme, within this dioces of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Redman, William, d. 1602.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by STC to William Redman.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
